Class Particle3D

java.lang.Object
  Particle
      Particle3D

public class Particle3D
extends Particle

The Particle3D class defines a particle in 3 dimensional space with a mass, a location, a speed, a net force, and a color.

Author:
Christopher Glasz

Field Summary
private  double z
          The z coordinate of the particle
private  double zNetForce
          The z component of the current net force on the particle
private  double zSpeed
          The z component of the current speed of the particle

advance

public void advance()
Moves the particle according to its current position, speed, and the net force acting on it

Overrides:
advance in class Particle

colorByForce

public void colorByForce()
Sets the particles color according to the net force acting on it. The larger the net force, the warmer the color. particles with low net force are a subdued blue.

Overrides:
colorByForce in class Particle
